page.title: 08 ATTITUDES TO SCHOOL
page.content: We interviewed a number of local people on their attitudes to school. Most people liked school as a place for meeting friends. People preferred secondary school to primary school, and their most favourite subject was English,with least favourite subject being Mathematics. The thing that most people liked about their teachers was their fairness, and teachers who shouted were not generally liked. But lots of people had liked school and would not have wanted to change it. Generally people thought that school in the 1980's were lacking in discipline.Nevertheless most adults interviewed would not like to be at school today and denied that school days were 'the best years of your life'.
